references: Proposed in: [Clerk File 279623](http://clerk.seattle.gov/~scripts/nph-brs.exe?s1=&s3=279623&s2=&s4=&Sect4=AND&l=20&Sect2=THESON&Sect3=PLURON&Sect5=CFCF1&Sect6=HITOFF&d=CFCF&p=1&u=/~public/cfcf1.htm&r=0&f=SCF%20279623); Unsuccessful attempt at repeal: [Council Bill 98602](http://clerk.seattle.gov/~scripts/nph-brs.exe?s1=&s3=98602&s4=&s2=&s5=&Sect4=AND&l=20&Sect2=THESON&Sect3=PLURON&Sect5=CBORY&Sect6=HITOFF&d=ORDF&p=1&u=/~public/cbory.htm&r=0&f=S); Repealed by: [Ordinance 107224](http://clerk.seattle.gov/~scripts/nph-brs.exe?s1=&s3=&s4=107224&s2=&s5=&Sect4=AND&l=20&Sect2=THESON&Sect3=PLURON&Sect5=CBORY&Sect6=HITOFF&d=ORDF&p=1&u=/~public/cbory.htm&r=0&f=S)
summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the registration of bicycles; defining offenses and providing penalties, and providing for a Bicycle Safety Education Program in connection therewith.
